intro: Episcia rosea, commonly known as the Rosy Wandering君子兰, is a member of the Gesneriaceae family and is native to the tropical regions of South America. It is a herbaceous perennial plant characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in shades of pink, red, and white. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments and thrives in humid conditions with indirect sunlight. Its leaves are often velvety and have a striking, waxy appearance. Episcia rosea is popular among gardeners for its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
